content: lion brand pattern # 742 *cctq-plush pdf* skill level beginner level 1 chenille thick & quick® article #950 *discontinued* 700 yards *super bulky weight yarn can be substituted * crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm special stitch single_crochet through back loop work in pattern until until throw measures 48 from beginning crochet edging to finish see plush throw #767 1 for the knit version 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/plush-throw-767
